main event: A radar return is reported as a planet by Vandus Yahnkin in Brooklyn, New York.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes,The report was generated on April 8,The object was described as a ground-radar return,There is speculation regarding the identification of the object as a satellite that appeared consistently at the same time,The report indicates the object emitted a steady light similar to a star but much brighter.
sighted object: radar return interpreted as a planet
witness description: Vandus Yahnkin, who reported seeing a larger object and a smaller stationary object in the sky.
